item.title: Why This Blog and My Project Documentation Journey
item.description: Hello and welcome to my first blog post! If you’re reading this, then you’re witnessing the beginning of my journey as I document my projects and share my experiences as a developer. I’ve created this space to provide an insight into my world of coding, specifically with Node.js (particularly Next.js), DevOps, and automation with Raspberry Pi. Why This Blog? In the world of development and technology, continuous learning is key. Throughout my journey, I’ve realized that documenting my work not only helps me consolidate my learning, but also provides an opportunity for others to learn from my experiences.
